title: Liz Truss – 2022 Comments in Sarajevo on Russian Invasion of Ukraine
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Liz Truss, the Foreign Secretary, in Sarajevo on 26 May 2022.
content:
Russia’s aggression cannot be appeased. It must be met with strength.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

We must not allow a prolonged and increasingly painful conflict to develop in Ukraine.

We must be relentless in ensuring Ukraine prevails through military aid and sanctions. We can’t take our foot off the accelerator now.
